nodes.description: Omagh炸弹袭击导致29人死亡，由Real IRA策划
nodes.support_text: families of many of the 29 murdered in the 'Real IRA' massacre gathered in Belfast

nodes.description: 受害者家属在贝尔法斯特观看纪录片《Omagh》
nodes.support_text: Mr McCombe, whose wife Ann died in the car bomb attack on the Co Tyrone town nearly six years ago, said: "It was a very powerful, brilliant film true to every fact."

nodes.description: 纪录片由Guy Hibbert和Paul Greengrass联合创作，Pete Travis执导
nodes.support_text: Jointly written by Guy Hibbert and Paul Greengrass, Omagh was directed by Pete Travis and produced by Ed Guiney along with Greengrass

nodes.description: 纪录片由RTÉ和Channel 4于当月后期首播并计划影院上映
nodes.support_text: It is due to be screened on RTÉ and Channel 4 later this month before going on general cinema release

nodes.description: 受害者家属发起1000万英镑民事诉讼指控五名嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: the families are taking a £10 million sterling civil action against the five men they suspect of plotting and carrying out the attack

nodes.description: 家属宣布电影是必要的
nodes.support_text: 家属宣布电影是必要的

nodes.description: 受害者家属表示电影可能让凶手被抓获
nodes.support_text: 受害者家属表示电影可能让凶手被抓获

nodes.description: 电影可能导致凶手被抓获
nodes.support_text: 电影可能导致凶手被抓获

nodes.description: 戏剧记录了未解决的搜索和持续的斗争
nodes.support_text: the drama chronicles the unresolved search for the perpetrators of the bombing and the persistent struggle of the families

nodes.description: 家庭持续寻找炸弹袭击者
nodes.support_text: the families are conducting a persistent search for the perpetrators

edges.support_text: families of many of the 29 murdered in the 'Real IRA' massacre gathered in Belfast
Mr McCombe, whose wife Ann died in the car bomb attack on the Co Tyrone town nearly six years ago
电影题为'Omagh'发生在贝尔法斯特聚集事件之后
Jointly written by Guy Hibbert and Paul Greengrass, Omagh was directed by Pete Travis and produced by Ed Guiney along with Greengrass
It is due to be screened on RTÉ and Channel 4 later this month before going on general cinema release
宣布电影必要性发生在电影命名之后
家属表态发生在宣布必要性之后
电影可能影响发生在家属表态之后
抓获凶手发生在电影可能影响之后
